Hello,


how can I extract the content from the .warc files ?

For instance=
, for the items from:

http://archive.org/details/webshots-freeze-frame-201=
21008200942

https://archive.org/details/archiveteam-cinch-00000009

You do=
n't have to download the entire file (40 GB ), just  get 200 MB and you can=
 extract the .warc files from the .tar files ... 

Thanks in advance, I loo=
ked all over Google but the solutions are very hard - install countless ser=
vers, software, etc., when I only want a fast command to just EXTRACT the f=
iles from the .warc archives. 

Thanks in advance !
